msIdentifier.institution: Royal Asiatic Society of Great Britain and Ireland

msItem.title: A manuscript of bayad form mostly containing poetry with other assorted notes.
msItem.note: Much of the MS is taken up by a long devotional and ethical poem in mutaqarib metre, missing the beginning. Other pieces are of a similar pious nature. Ruled margins and dividing panels. A few headings in red. Some folios tinted blue.
msItem.incipit: Ankih amad nuh falak mi'raj-i u

listBibl.bibl: For Price's bequest see J.R.A.S., iii (1836), pp. xii-xiv, lx.

layoutDesc.p: No of lines varies; mostly written diagonally

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
